org.apache.hadoop.fs.s3a.s3guard

Class S3GuardTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.apache.hadoop.fs.s3a.s3guard.S3GuardTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool

    public abstract class S3GuardTool
extends org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
implements org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
    CLI to manage S3Guard Metadata Store.

      • run

        public abstract int run(String[] args,
                        PrintStream out)
                 throws Exception
        Run the tool, capturing the output (if the tool supports that). As well as returning an exit code, the implementations can choose to throw an instance of ExitUtil.ExitException with their exit code set to the desired exit value. The exit code of auch an exception is used for the tool's exit code, and the stack trace only logged at debug.
        Parameters:
        args - argument list
        out - output stream
        Returns:
        the exit code to return.
        Throws:
        Exception - on any failure
        ExitUtil.ExitException - for an alternative clean exit

      • toUri

        protected static URI toUri(String s3Path)
        Convert a path to a URI, catching any URISyntaxException and converting to an invalid args exception.
        Parameters:
        s3Path - path to convert to a URI
        Returns:
        a URI of the path
        Throws:
        ExitUtil.ExitException - INVALID_ARGUMENT if the URI is invalid

        Throws:
